Container.Name: Foptimum
Container.Overview: An internet uptime monitoring tool that serves stats using Prometheus.

Config.Name: Prometheus Server Port
Config.Description: The port where Prometheus will be exposing result data

Config.Name: Speedtest Interval
Config.Description: How often in seconds the speedtest will run (set to 0 to disable speed test)

Config.Name: Ping Interval
Config.Description: How often in seconds to ping servers in the server list (set to 0 to disable pings)

Config.Name: Server List
Config.Description: Comma delimited list of IPs to ping
